channel.title: CVE Feed for NUUO -- NUUO NVRMini2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NUUO -- NUUO NVRMini2

item.title: CVE-2018-1150|2024-09-17T04:08:55.307Z -- nuuo -- nuuo%20nvrmini2
item.description: NUUO's NVRMini2 3.8.0 and below contains a backdoor that would allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to take over user accounts if the file /tmp/moses exists.
